name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior QA Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in Python and JavaScript, skilled in developing and testing high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in utilizing **PyTest** and **Playwright** for thorough testing and automation of applications, while maintaining REST API standards. Expertise in Azure DevOps, including **Azure Pipelines**, and adept at managing project workflows with tools like **Jira** and **TestRail**.

Experienced in ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, bringing a strong understanding of cloud services on **Azure**. Solid background in database management with **Cosmos DB** and **MongoDB**, alongside leveraging **Git** for version control. Committed to implementing continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) best practices, while proficient in performance monitoring through **Datadog**. Driven to deliver quality assurance in software development processes while optimizing team productivity.
